div.br:
As information about Coronavirus unfolds, there can be a wide range of thoughts, feelings and reactions. Fear and anxiety can be overwhelming and cause strong emotions in adults and children. Coping with stress will make you, the people you care about, and your community stronger. Our CISD School Counselors are valuable supports during this time. A list of helpful tips, lessons, community resources as well as counselor contact information is below.
CAMPUS COUNSELOR EMAIL
